price: Such is Allah, your True Lord. What is beyond the truth except falsehood? So how could you be averted [from the truth]?”
arabic: فَذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ ٱلۡحَقِّ إِلَّا ٱلضَّلَٰلُۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fadhālikumu al-lahu rabbukumu al-ḥaqu famādhā baʿda al-ḥaqi illā al-ḍalālu fa-annā tuṣ'rafūna
